players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "I am the mafioso and I killed Alice last night. Keep an eye on Bob, as he seems suspicious."
Diana: "Bob, I think you're the mafioso. Charlie's confession is suspicious and doesn't add up."
You: "I am not the mafioso. I'm just a villager who's trying to survive."
